<resource>
  <capability namespace='osgi.identity'>
    <attribute name='osgi.identity' value='org.example.j'/>
    <attribute name='type' value='osgi.bundle'/>
    <attribute name='version' type='Version' value='0.0.0'/>
  </capability>
  <capability namespace='osgi.content'>
    <attribute name='osgi.content' value='testdata/10-exportservice.jar'/>
    <attribute name='description' value='org.example.j'/>
    <attribute name='size' value='1119'/>
  </capability>
  <capability namespace='osgi.wiring.bundle'>
    <attribute name='osgi.wiring.bundle' value='org.example.j'/>
    <attribute name='bundle-version' type='Version' value='0.0.0'/>
  </capability>
  <capability namespace='osgi.wiring.host'>
    <attribute name='osgi.wiring.host' value='org.example.j'/>
    <attribute name='bundle-version' type='Version' value='0.0.0'/>
  </capability>
  <capability namespace='osgi.wiring.service'>
    <attribute name='osgi.wiring.service' value='org.example.a.A'/>
  </capability>
</resource>
